data.name: Roblox Avatar BG
data.description: It changes the background behind your character in avatar.

data.name: Transparent Telegram
data.description: A transparent, borderless and dark Telegram UI. Options: - Custom Background Image (and it's size, position and blurriness) or Color - Transparency Interface Color - Messages Bubbles sizes and Joining - Fullscreen - Colors (Accent, Text) - Font Family - Custom Installed Font Family Try Minimal Transparent Whatsapp theme! Suggest new features and/or detect bugs, thank you!

data.name: Whatsapp Dracula - Dark Theme
data.description: Whatsapp Theme based on Dracula Theme

data.name: no baners.n.e.mail
data.description: Blocking all ads in the new e.mail.ru
data.css: @-moz-document domain("e.mail.ru"){#app-canvas .layout_bordered > .layout__column_right .slot, [class^=banner], [id^=banner], [class^=adv], [class^=ads], [data-draggable-id^=ads]{display:none!important;position: fixed !important;}/*В опере работает с отключением расширения "Блокировка рекламы Opera". Источники: "AdGuard", "RUS: RU AdList"*/}

data.name: Trello Dark Theme [V1.1.3]
data.description: A dark theme for Trello so you can work in the dark.
